Reviews.Title: “Okay for what you pay for.”

Reviews.Content: people mind hotel definitely budget hotel aspects life pay pros cheap location fine perfect surprisingly considering budget hotel beds adequate slept fine sheets changed daily dirty sheets free bottles water daily free teacoffee nicely air conditioned tv fine bar fridge adequate size compared shoebox size upmarket hotels days adequately clean supplied hair dryer extra pillow cons corridors arent air conditioned guess isnt surprising carpets heavily stained stains walls ceiling bathroom wasnt clean toilets clean shower heads water savers woefully inadequate amount water sheet lie isnt tuck bottom bed youll notice youre 6 cm tall oddly disturbed sleep youre sensitive youre tall real bar fridges day half cool reasonable temperature wall sockets fittings replacing dangerous overall budget hotel cheaper majority budget hotels passed prime lousy shower real hotel able sleep trouble recommend hotel didnt luxury midrange hotels mind willing settle wasnt pristine sleep yes comforts luxuries home honest looking budget hotel ps weeks stayed 2 checked visit malaysia couple days
